about_the_game:
This route features ‘Altoona Works’ and it (also known as Altoona Terminal) is a large railroad industrial complex in Altoona, Pennsylvania. It was built between 1850 and 1925 by the Pennsylvania Railroad, to supply the railroad with locomotives, railroad cars and related equipment. For many years, it was the largest railroad shop complex in the world.
Several thrilling shunting sessions and new locomotives are included in this dlc. The state of the art locomotives features advanced features like fuel consuming or fan speeds related to engine load.

Features:
- Altoona Works railroad complex, Pennsylvania
- open world route
- 4 sessions
- multiplayer session

New Locomotives:
- CSX SW1500 YN2
- CSX SW1500 YN3
- NS SW1500
- NS 8025 (Monongaleha) 
- NS 8098 (Conrail)
- NS 8104 (Lehigh Valley)
- NS 8105 (Interstate)
- NS 8102 (Pennsylvania)
- NS 4822 (Railfans)

Locomotive Features:
- animated drivers cabin
- animated wipers
- ACS coupling supported
- running numbers
- animated fans
- custom head and ditchlight
